price: 80. And when the sorcerers came, Mûsâ (Moses) said to them: "Cast down what you want to cast!"
arabic: فَلَمَّا جَآءَ ٱلسَّحَرَةُ قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰٓ أَلۡقُواْ مَآ أَنتُم مُّلۡقُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Hilali and Khan
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English by Taqi-ud-Din Al-Hilali and Muhsen Khan

meta.transliteration: falammā jāa al-saḥaratu qāla lahum mūsā alqū mā antum mul'qūna
